Welcome to Battle Royale Bot's documentation!
=============================================

Getting Started
---------------

This is where you can provide a brief introduction and instructions on how to get started with your Battle Royale Bot project.

Key Features
------------

Here, you can list the main features of your bot, such as:

- Manage a Battle Royale game in Twitch chat
- Automatically add participants and simulate battles
- Display statistics and the final winner

Usage
-----

Explain how users can interact with your bot, such as the available commands and how to use them.

API Reference
-------------

This is where you can include links to the automatically generated documentation for your `battleroyale_logic` and `battleroyale_bot` modules.
